git status -- to check whether that particular folder is a git repository or not
git init -- to make that a git repository ,, 
git add --a --> add all the files in this folder to staging area --a means all
git commit -m "initial commit"

git log -- see the changes
rm -rf .git -- deletes all the files in the git repository

git diff -- compares ur staging area with current working directory
git diff --stage --> comapares ur previous and next files in the staging area

git remote add origin
